derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: in early use from medieval Latin accentuatio(n-); in later use (early 19th cent.) from accentuate

means.word_mean: 1. the use or application of an accent; the relative prominence of syllables in a phrase or utterance
2. the act of giving special importance or significance to something
